typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		TotalCost as decimal(19,4),
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SoutchridgeOrdersOutputStream
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitCost as decimal(19,4),
		LineNumber as integer,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SourcebridgeOrderDetailsOutputStream
SoutchridgeOrdersOutputStream, SourcebridgeOrderDetailsOutputStream join(SoutchridgeOrdersOutputStream@OrderID == SourcebridgeOrderDetailsOutputStream@OrderID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOrdersAndDetails
JoinOrdersAndDetails select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = SoutchridgeOrdersOutputStream@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		RentalDate = OrderDate,
		TotalCost,
		CreatedDate = SoutchridgeOrdersOutputStream@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = SoutchridgeOrdersOutputStream@UpdatedDate,
		MovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOrdersColumns
SelectOrdersColumns derive(Source = 'Southridge') ~> AddColumns
AddColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UnifiedOrders
